headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting The 3M (MMM) Investment Story
summary: The Street’s view on 3M has shifted only slightly on paper, with the consensus analyst price target moving from about US$174.25 to around US$177.32. That small adjustment sits on top of a wide range of individual target changes, reflecting very different opinions about how much investors may be willing to pay for the stock. As you read on, keep an eye on how these cross currents shape the evolving story around 3M and how you can track future shifts in that narrative. Stay updated as the Fair...
